column5: Hey guys I will be go to lake Simcoe in late August and wondered how the fishing would be around this time of year. I will be fishing from the shore most likely. What kind of lures do you think will work best? I am a novice, so right now I have power grubs, and a Mepps Black Fury small spinner. What else do you suggest I try out??   Thanks
lake simcoe has 144 miles of shoreline, you might want to give an area you will be at but it doesn't matter, that is a hard time of year to fish from shore on simcoe
I will be camping at Sibbald Point. So anywhere around that shore line.
Very true,but fish can be had, Like asked,where?
Not sure from shore there,but if you had a boat,I could tell ya few spots.
